TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MembershipProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: 繼承 抽象類別的物件之集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的成員資格提供者會公開為唯讀由屬性類別。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取集合中特定的成員資格提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區管理成員資格資訊，以及存取的成員資格提供者的自訂成員不屬於抽象類別。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉的 ASP.NET 成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 如需與成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用角色提供者物件複製到指定的陣列。This method uses to copy role provider objects to the specified array. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，將複製的內容陣列物件。The following code example uses the method to copy the contents of a to an array of objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection/CS/snippetscs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipProviderCollection/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: The number of elements in the source array is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 來源陣列的型別不能自動轉換成目的端 的型別。

span.span: The type of the source array cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的成員資格提供者會公開為唯讀由屬性類別。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取集合中特定的成員資格提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區管理成員資格資訊，以及存取的成員資格提供者的自訂成員不屬於抽象類別。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例存取設定從應用程式的屬性類別名稱。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
